data.description: A bundle of the modules required for Koha
data.communities:
The Koha devel mailling list and irc chatrooms and soon be be
    located in our CVS repository
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I discussed the namespace choice with the Koha development team in
    #Koha on the irc.koha.org server and received enthusiastic support
    as its would both shorten the time and provide an easier
    installation path for the product.

    Using KohaSupport provides a descriptive naming convention that is
    clear and concise to people.
